note:
Fred Zacaria born in 1959, studied at the University La Sapienza in Rome, is the founder since 2001 of "Acap", Associazione Cristiana Aiuto Pratico", a charitable mission helping the needy with free: food, clothing, courses, and mainly now domestic jobs, tens of thousands of families and persons found jobs through the mission. Various Acap prayer groups were formed in asian countries, combining pratical help with spiritual councelling.

For more info: www.fredzacaria.it
Email:fzakaria@yahoo.com
